availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Calvin Brock (Montgomery County, teacher, lawyer, and county judge)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, teacher, lawyer, and county judge. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Brock. Father of Mary E. Brock. Teacher in Montgomery County in 1850. Lawyer in Mt. Sterling, Kentucky. Served as judge for the Montgomery County Court.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 1, p. 37A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, Camargo, p. 22.
Records of the Internal Revenue Service, NARA RG 58, Series M768, Roll 15, p. 115.
Records of the Internal Revenue Service, NARA RG 58, Series M768, Roll 15, p. 666.
Records of the Internal Revenue Service, NARA RG 58, Series M768, Roll 21, p. 63.
